faction_profile.name: 보타문 (Botamun / Putuo Sect / 普陀門)
alias: Guardians of the East Sea (동해의 수호자)

location.mountain: Mt. Putuo (보타산 / 普陀山) - One of the Four Sacred Mountains of Buddhism.
location.geography: An island with an octagonal mountain shape. Scenic and isolated from the mainland.
landmarks: Puji Temple (보제사), Fayu Temple (법우사), Huiji Temple (혜제사)

heritage.composition: Predominantly Nuns (Bhikkhuni) or Monks. Similar to Emei but more isolated.

status.tier: Hidden Master Sect (Not typically in the Nine Great Sects, but elite).
status.role: Deus Ex Machina (Appears only during great crises).
status.reputation: Mysterious defenders who specialize in exorcism (Anti-Demon).

combat_style.summary: Buddhist Divine Light & Vast Ocean Power.
combat_style.specialty: Demon Subduing (Hang-ma / 降魔) - Highly effective against Demonic Cults or evil spirits.
combat_style.vibe: Holy, majestic, and vast like the sea.

duality.light: Saviours appearing from the sea to stop the Demonic Cult.
duality.shadow: Corrupt monks hiding away from the world with dark secrets (optional twist).

list.name: 창해심법 (Azure Sea Heart Method)
list.effect: Accumulates Qi as vast and deep as the ocean.

list.name: 항마수미신장 (Demon Subduing Sumeru Divine Palm)
list.description: Signature Ultimate. Rivals the 'Tathagata Palm'. Causes internal rupture in those with evil Qi (Demon detectors).
list.effect: Holy damage boost against Dark/Demonic alignment.

list: 복마앙불 (Demon Subduing Looking Up at Buddha)

list.name: 대비천수검 (Great Compassion Thousand Hand Sword)
list.description: Creates an illusion of a thousand arms striking simultaneously.

list: 팔만사천보리항마검법 (84,000 Bodhi Demon Subduing Sword) - Ultimate technique.
천수일천검형 (Thousand Hand One Thousand Sword Form) - Illusion Mastery.

narrative_role: The 'Reinforcements from the Sea' when the Orthodox faction is cornered.
A sect that tests the protagonist's morality (Buddhist koans).
Rivals to the Emei Sect (Mainland Nuns vs Island Nuns).
Keepers of ancient Buddhist artifacts sealed on the island.
